name: Smukler v. Rogers Realty Company, Appellant

judges: Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
parties: Smukler v. Rogers Realty Company, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Pee Curiam,
The order is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Alessandboni of the court below. Costs of this appeal to be paid by appellant.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Ira Jewell Williams, with him William II. Peace and Ira Jewell Williams, Jr., for appellant.
Sylvan II. Hirsch, with him Robert John Breaker and Arthur M. Cooper, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Smukler v. Rogers Realty Company, Appellant.
Argued January 20, 1943.
Before Maxey, C. J.; Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson and Parker, JJ.
Ira Jewell Williams, with him William II. Peace and Ira Jewell Williams, Jr., for appellant.
Sylvan II. Hirsch, with him Robert John Breaker and Arthur M. Cooper, for appellee.
March 22, 1943:
